channel.title: Earased Computer, need your help!
channel.description:
[b]I lost my compiler options i dont know what it was i just got jdk6u2, but i dont remember the compiler for it does anyone know? not some long fancy one either, i want just a basic compiler iwth that jdk on it. Thanks if you give :)[/b]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Ok i got the path and everything. [b]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin[/b] but how do i turn that into a compiler. Happy now :D

item.title: Earased Computer, need your help!
item.dc:creator: @Stuey Stuey
item.description:
@Stuey wrote:

I think this should be in Questions But here we go…

To download the latest JDK, follow this link - http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Then Click the JDK update 2 or something…

Once there, check the “Accept License Agreement.” It will redirect you to the same page. Then check, “Windows Offline Installation.” Then click the orange bar above that, it says “Download Selected with Sun Download Manager.” Or Just click on Windows offline Installation And that will open as an Application. You dont need the Sun Download Manager, But it can help…

And the Compiler Code…

@echo off COLOR 0a Java Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
